name: Sultannoying Deadlines
description:
You can use Q instead of A if you're on an AZERTY keyboard!

My Public Domain Jam game, starring Scheherazade as a tormented writer for a popular tourism magazine, 1001 Nights.

Music created using the default instruments in Ableton Live, graphics made in Photoshop.

Fonts used:

  • bpdots.squares-bold (from 1001fonts) : BPdots font family is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-NoDerivs License (CC BY-ND).
  • Times New Roman (comes by default with Windows 8)


To the extent possible under law, Vaida Plankyté has waived all copyright and related or neighboring rights to Sultannoying Deadlines. This work is published from: Belgium.
